entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Drumheller
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:18 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Drumheller 06:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -21.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -24.5°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
